resources.string: Welcome to Voltix! Experience unparalleled security with our two-factor authentication and trusted device integration. Your assets are fully self-custodial, ensuring complete control and peace of mind.
We don\'t track your activities or require any registrations. Your anonymity is safeguarded as our platform is fully open-source, ensuring transparency and trust.
Voltix is audited and proven secure. Join thousands of users who trust us with their digital assets. Get started now and embrace the future of secure cryptocurrency storage with Voltix.
Keep all devices on same WiFi with Voltix App open. (May not work on hotel/airport WiFi)
